data.text:
Gloria Marsh (formerly Chandler & Marick) is a fictional character on the ABC daytime soap opera All My Children.

Actress History:[]

Teresa Blake (10/1991-01/1998)

Family and relationships:[]

Helen Marsh (mother)

Single

Anna Chandler (daughter, with Adam Chandler Sr., deceased)

Other relatives:[]
